title: Is This One Big Psy-Op? (Ep 1690)
description:
In this episode, I address a fascinating piece by Michael Anton which clearly breaks down the left’s ongoing psy-op against us. 

News Picks:


Liberal losers at “Politi-fact” try to cover up Joe Biden’s racist comments.


Here’s the real cost of NY City’s soft on crime policies.

The “civil war” psy-op you need to read about.

The growth in home schooling is a positive development.


This op-ed writer should stay out of Florida.
